author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Having defeated Foulhoof, Edmark and his fellowship look ahead to ACT II and reap the rewards of the Bonus Cards in Act I. SPOILERS AHEAD! 

Big thanks to GW for a complimentary copy of the box to review. 

#AdWIP

#WarhammerQuest

#WarhammerCommunity

title: WARHAMMER QUEST:  Darkwater ACT I (EPILOGUE)

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The Boss of Act 1 has been cornered and now Edmark and his Fellowship must face down the flesh-sculpting Beastman in its lair. Screeching Mire Kelpies and hulking Cankerborn lurch to the Shaman's defence as the battered Heroes arrive for a final confrontation. 

Big thanks to GW for a complimentary copy of the box to review.
